troparion: (Tone 1) Night and day, we implore You, O Lord:* grant us the forgiveness of our sins* that we may bow before You,* O Lord and lover of mankind,* and glorify You in peace.
prokimenon: O Lord, do not rebuke me in your anger;
do not punish me, Lord, in your rage.
Your arrows have sunk deep in me; Your hand has come down upon me.
second_prokimenon: turn your ear to my cry.
I said: I will be watchful of my ways for fear I should sin with my tongue.
